strapiPost.title: NWA Schools Rank High In Arkansas On Niche
strapiPost.content:
Niche released their 2023 school rankings, naming multiple schools across NWA on its list of top schools in Arkansas. 

  • Public: Eight of the top 10 public schools in Arkansas are in NWA according to Niche, many being recognized for their college prep, STEM programs, diversity, and excellent teachers. 
  • Private: Niche named the overall best private school in Arkansas as Bentonvilleâ€™s Thaden School, recognized for its excellent academics, diversity, teachers, student activities, and college prep.

See where NWA schools fall on Niche HERE.
